basics.name: Mujtaba "Arthur" Quadri
basics.label: Alumni
basics.summary: Raised and schooled in Hawaii, currently working as a contractor for the State of Maine

courses: Graduated with summa cum laude distinction and a 3.98/4.00 GPA; UH Mānoa Dean’s List every semester
Worked on multiple full-stack class projects including participating in 2 hackathons
Created and moderated multiple Discords for online classes, facilitating study groups and peer discussions.
President of PandA (Programming and Algorithms) club

work.summary: Developing alongside a team of Hawai'i government employees and contracted FAST Enterprises employees on the internal GenTax website and the public DOTAX tax.hawaii.gov website.
highlights: Worked on the 2022 Year-End Changes project, updating many forms and parts of the site for 2023.
Collaborated with the team for multiple passes of end-to-end testing of the system and changes.
Regular meetings with management discussing progress, prioritization, and requirements for tasks.

work.summary: Independent contractor, working on ISEC website and providing IT support
highlights: LAMP (Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP) tech stack
Hundred-thousand-line legacy code base with little documentation
Interfacing with non-tech-fluent admin team on programming tasks
Training new developer for work on the site
